mapper.insert: insert into qmboard(qmnum, userid, qmtitle, qmContent, qmdate, qmanswer, qmoption) values(qmboardsq.nextval, 'qwer', #{qmtitle}, #{qmcontent}, sysdate, null, 1)
mapper.select: select qmnum, userid, qmtitle, qmcontent, to_char(qmdate,'MM-DD HH:MI') as qmdate, qmanswer, qmoption from qmboard where qmoption = 1 order by qmnum desc
select qmnum, userid, qmtitle, qmcontent, to_char(qmdate,'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') as qmdate, qmanswer, qmoption, to_char(qmanserdate,'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') as qmanserdate from qmboard where qmnum=${param1}
mapper.update: update qmboard set qmtitle=#{qmtitle}, qmcontent=#{qmcontent} where qmnum=#{qmnum}
